nodes.text: Sapir was a plant known to the galaxy by the last decades of the Galactic Republic. Its leaves were used to make the sapir tea, a hot, green-colored beverage with a fragrant smell that was suitable for Human consumption. A favorite of Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn, sapir tea was served in the Jedi Temple on the Republic capital of Coruscant.
Sapir's first and thus far only mention in Star Wars canon comes from Secrets of the Jedi. Published in 2005, the young reader novel written by Jude Watson.
